name: @hashtag-design-system/primitives
description: The CSS (SCSS) primitives of the #hashtag Design System

scripts.npm:pusblish: yarn scss && npm version $npm_config_version && npm publish
scripts.npm:patch: yarn scss && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.npm:minor: yarn scss && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.npm:major: yarn scss && npm version major && npm publish

author: George Krachtopoulos <georgekraxt@gmail.com>
